attributes.action: to ensure that all nations and all state institutions are compelled to fly the Union Flag (The Union Jack) regardless of if they are devolved or not.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Exempting parts of the Union from the requirements to fly the Union Flag defeats the object of this initiative, the Union Flag should be flown, along with the flags of the respective nations if desired, to demonstrate that we are as united now as we have ever been.
